typeProperties.script:
source(output(

		Cost_Sharing_Reduction_Code_Desc as string

	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCostSharingReductionCode
SRCostSharingReductionCode sink(input(

		CreationDate as timestamp,

	validateSchema: false,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
